long_description: Whether you're combing sandy beaches or negotiating the afternoon commute, these sunglasses protect your eyes nicely. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Nylon frames withstand impact from extreme outdoor sports.
short_description: Whether you're combing sandy beaches or negotiating the afternoon commute, these sunglasses protect your eyes nicely.
